title: If we are in the 21st century, when is the 20th century? - Quora

response.answer_text: The 1st century was year 1 through 100. The 2nd century was year 101 to 200. The 3rd century was year 201 to 300. … The 19th century was the year 1801 to 1900. The 20th century was the year 1901 to 2000. So, yes, this is the 21st century, from the year 2001 to 2100. And, yes, everybody celebrated the millennium 1 year early because they couldn’t wait and didn’t understand that 10 is the end of the decade and 100 is the end of a century. Well, and they didn’t care because they wanted to party like it was 1999… and maybe in a little red corvette.  Q: If we are in the 21st century, when is the 20th century?

The 20th century has obviously passed if we are in the 21st century, and depending on how you measure a century it was either from 1900 to 1999 or 1901 to 2000 (since there was no year 0, the latter is probably the correct time period)
